mapper.sql: id AS id, meeting_id AS meetingId, room_num AS roomNum, duration_type AS durationType, pay_order_id AS payOrderId, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, user_create AS userCreate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_meeting_live ( id, meeting_id, room_num, duration_type, pay_order_id, gmt_create, user_create ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{meetingId}, #{roomNum}, #{durationType}, #{payOrderId}, #{gmtCreate}, #{userCreate} )
